snippet: Minutes of the December session show that Federal Reserve policy makers were encouraged about the economy but determined not to act too quickly on interest rates.
abstract: Federal Open Market Committee minutes from December 2014 meeting reveal Fed officials were more optimistic about domestic economy while still concerned about global economy; notes suggest Fed will continue to keep interest rates low for some time.
lead_paragraph: Minutes of the December session show that Federal Reserve policy makers were encouraged about the economy but determined not to act too quickly on interest rates.

headline.main: Fed Committee Hopeful, but Wary at Last Session
headline.print_headline: Fed Committee Hopeful but Wary at Latest Session
